item.title: Soccer – Black & White Bean bag leather
item.dc:creator: Furme
item.description: The plush and fun Round Soccer Ball Bean Bag offers comfortable, eye-catching seating to any space. Made of matte-finished vinyl with double-stitched seams, comfy and durable design is perfect for relaxing,
item.content:encoded:
The plush and fun Round Soccer Ball Bean Bag offers comfortable, eye-catching seating to any space. Made of matte-finished vinyl with double-stitched seams, comfy and durable design is perfect for relaxing, reading, playing video games, or watching TV.
– Tough, stain resistant, easily cleaned with damp cloth, and waterproof artificial leather fabric
– Filled with Teddy beans that conform to you, not the other way around;
– Newer, smaller, and 20-percent denser teddy beans
– Double stitched and double zippers for added strength and safety
– Spot clean
